EmailTemplate.name: AP File Due
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Virtual_FEP__c.Account_Name__c} AP File Due
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Virtual_FEP__c.OwnerFirstName},
It has now been 90 days since the last AP file was received, please request a new file from this customer & update the {!Virtual_FEP__c.Name} FEP's Last AP File Date field.
If there are any issues with this email please contact your Salesforce Administrator
